scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Heather L
scrape.text:
This narration did not match the theme of the book. I felt like I was listening to pleasant dinner theater instead of the much darker story this novel suggests. The first 20% of the book was all about Serge and his pretentious ways. It did not move along with the tone or pace....gave up after 30%.
NEXT!
